thread.title: carol
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by carol

author: carol
title: carol
text:
After long gap in doing it myself, staff on phone were very helpful, mailed samples and even "held" my discount for the order to follow. Excellent
assistance, including opinions when sought, and a later mailing of a frame that was temporarily out of stock...at the discount listed earlier.
Good business practices and the price was really good!
